title: Not Your Experiment
description: ASIN B00VIRQ5DU moved to the most recent edition hereSince coming out as a lesbian, Nina has always had straight women wanting to use her for their “experimenting”, and usually without telling her. But when Ellie, her co-maid of honor for her best friend Heather, wants to experiment with Nina, how can she say no? And what happens when her feelings for Ellie become undeniable; can Ellie feel the same?
author: S.B. Sheeran
